Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Uniformed FDNY EMS Retirees Association Files of Richard McAllan
McAllan, Richard
Pizzitola, Marianne
Uniformed FDNY EMS Retirees Association
WAG.307
0.25 Linear Feet (1 box)
undated 1 box (.2 linear foot). Records primarily were gathered by Richard McAllan, former Local 2507 President, and senior NYC Paramedic. Documents also concern the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation, and the EMTs and Paramedics of Local 2507 of New York, New York. Materials are in English
Scope and Contents
1 box (.2 linear foot). Records primarily were gathered by Richard McAllan, former Local 2507 President, and senior NYC Paramedic. Documents also concern the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation, and the EMTs and Paramedics of Local 2507 of New York, New York.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Uniformed FDNY EMS Retirees Association Files of Richard McAllan; WAG 307; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Marianne Pizzitola, President of the Uniformed FDNY EMS Retirees Association, Inc. sent a gift of Richard McAllan's files from his time as president of the Uniformed FDNY EMS Retirees Association in 2007. The accession number associated with this gift is 2009.033.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Richard McAllan was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
Pizzitola, Marianne Uniformed FDNY EMS Retirees Association
Unprocessed Records1
